data.taskTitle: user created steelbridge-b2y.int but /tasks does not show epics
user created steelbridge-b2y.int but /tasks does not show epics
data.approach: Create /tasks2 page by cloning /tasks and adding project/epic grouping from /dash. Will group sessions and tasks by project with collapsible sections, then group by epic within each project using accordion behavior. Maintain table aesthetic of /tasks.

summary: Identified need for enhanced /tasks view with project and epic grouping
Proposed design for /tasks2 that mirrors /tasks aesthetic while adding navigation improvements
Outlined approach for bundling epic tasks and project sessions for better user experience

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Epic and Project Grouping in /tasks2
suggestedTasks.description: Create a new view component for /tasks2 that dynamically groups tasks by epic and project. Use existing /tasks styling as a baseline. Implement hierarchical display that allows users to expand/collapse epic and project sections for improved navigation and information density.
suggestedTasks.reason: Direct follow-up to original task requirement of improved task organization

suggestedTasks.title: Design UX Interaction Patterns for Epic/Project Grouping
suggestedTasks.description: Define and document interaction patterns for epic and project task grouping. Create wireframes and interaction specifications for how users will navigate, expand/collapse, and interact with grouped tasks. Include considerations for mobile and desktop experiences.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure smooth user experience for new task navigation paradigm

gotchas: Ensure performance with large numbers of tasks
Handle edge cases with task/epic relationships

documentationNeeds: Create user guide for new /tasks2 navigation
